name: Blossom App - by Kidizz
description: ** Blossom App the first application dedicated to parents, kindergartens, preschools. Blossom App is a special application for parents of children attending nurseries or kindergartens. It connects families and childcare professionals who work daily with their child (ren). Parents can find various contents posted by childcare professionals: anecdotes, menus, appointments of the year, photographs of their child(ren) and even educational information that will help them better understand the world of nursery and early childhood. Dedicated and customized for each nursery and child, Blossom App is a completely secure shared space between the family and the nurserys team. Easy to use, Blossom App is intended to complement and facilitate the relations between the family and the nursery. Via Blossom App, parents can: - Access the news thread - Send messages to the nurserys professionals through special messaging - Find photo albums of their child(ren) - Access the nurserys schedule to find the highlights - Download documents: operation settings, educational project, rhymes, menus ...
